entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
